edges.description: Edges are lines that connect one node to another

nodes.description: Nodes are objects within the canvas. Nodes may be text, files, links, or groups

anyOf.description: A color in hex format, e.g. #ff0000

JSONCanvasColorPreset.title: A preset color.
JSONCanvasColorPreset.description:
Six preset colors exist, mapped to the following numbers:
1 red
2 orange
3 yellow
4 green
5 cyan
6 purple

fromNode.description: The ID of the node that the edge starts from

fromSide.description: The side of the node that the edge connects from

label.description: The text label for the edge

toNode.description: The ID of the node that the edge ends at

toSide.description: The side of the node that the edge connects to

JSONCanvasEdgeEnd.description: The rendering style of the end of the edge line

JSONCanvasEdgeSide.description: The side of the node that the edge connects to

file.description: The path to the file within the system

height.description: The height of the node in pixels

subpath.description: The subpath that may link to a heading or a block. Always starts with a #

width.description: The width of the node in pixels

x.description: The x position of the node in pixels

y.description: The y position of the node in pixels

background.description: The path to the background image

backgroundStyle.title: The rendering style of a background image.
backgroundStyle.description:
Options are:
cover - fills the entire width and height of the node.
ratio - maintains the aspect ratio of the background image.
repeat - repeats the image as a pattern in both x/y directions.
